response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to both of us, as it is worth $12,000 to you. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $10,500, allowing you to save $1,500 compared to its full value. I believe this offer presents a unique chance for you to benefit from the superior quality and features of our product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 10500}
